trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous segmented query on a table.
trans-unit.target: Ends an asynchronous segmented query on a table.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.IAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the pending asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.IAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the pending asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuerySegment`1</codeEntityReference> object of type <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.DynamicTableEntity</codeEntityReference> containing the results of executing the query.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuerySegment`1</codeEntityReference> object of type <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.DynamicTableEntity</codeEntityReference> containing the results of executing the query.

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous operation to query a table in segmented mode.
trans-unit.target: Ends an asynchronous operation to query a table in segmented mode.

trans-unit.source: The type of the results to be returned.
trans-unit.target: The type of the results to be returned.

trans-unit.source: Can be the entity type specified in the Begin or the result type of the resolver
trans-unit.target: Can be the entity type specified in the Begin or the result type of the resolver

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.IAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the pending asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.IAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the pending asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuerySegment`1</codeEntityReference> containing the results of executing the query.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuerySegment`1</codeEntityReference> containing the results of executing the query.

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous operation to execute a query in segmented mode.
trans-unit.target: Ends an asynchronous operation to execute a query in segmented mode.

trans-unit.source: The entity type of the query.
trans-unit.target: The entity type of the query.

trans-unit.source: The type into which the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityResolver`1</codeEntityReference> will project the query results.
trans-unit.target: The type into which the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityResolver`1</codeEntityReference> will project the query results.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.IAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the pending asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.IAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the pending asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuerySegment`1</codeEntityReference> containing the projection into type <codeInline>TResult</codeInline> of the results of executing the query.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuerySegment`1</codeEntityReference> containing the projection into type <codeInline>TResult</codeInline> of the results of executing the query.
